text.section: A person may not knowingly or fraudulently obtain or attempt to obtain a license to drive or a moped operator's permit by misrepresentation.
A person may not display or cause or permit to be displayed any canceled license.
A person may not display or cause or permit to be displayed any revoked license.
A person may not display or cause or permit to be displayed any suspended license.
A person may not display or cause or permit to be displayed any fictitious license.
A person may not display or cause or permit to be displayed any fraudulently altered license.
A person may not possess any canceled license.
A person may not possess any revoked license.
A person may not possess any suspended license.
A person may not possess any fictitious license.
A person may not possess any fraudulently altered license.
A person may not lend his license to any other person or knowingly permit the use of his license by another.
A person may not display or represent as his own any license not issued to him.
A person may not fail or refuse to surrender to the Administration on its lawful demand any license that has been suspended, revoked, or canceled.
A person may not permit any unlawful use of a license issued to him.
A person may not do any act forbidden or fail to perform any act required by this title.
